otherFeatureRow1Col1Content: Add or select from recommended categories that match products.
otherFeatureRow1Col2Content: Register new products by scanning or create one on the spot.
otherFeatureRow1Col3Content: Upload product photos for enhanced visualization.
otherFeatureRow1Col4Content: Upload your inventory Excel sheet for product registration.
otherFeatureRow2Col1Content: Easily make stock in and out with your smartphone scanner.
otherFeatureRow2Col2Content: Manage supplier, vendor information to make an accurate transaction.
otherFeatureRow2Col3Content: Search your teammates' transactions by various sorting options.
otherFeatureRow2Col4Content: Add past transactions by importing Excel sheet or export all transactions to a file.
otherFeatureRow3Col1Content: Search or filter products by categories to check the status.
otherFeatureRow3Col2Content: Scan barcodes with smartphone cameras to view status at once.
otherFeatureRow3Col3Content: Check inventory balance changes by the product.
otherFeatureRow3Col4Content: Various useful analysis to never miss out on your inventory status.
otherFeatureRow3Col5Content: Analyze your inventory with various inventory data.
otherFeaturesDesc:
From product register, stock in & out, to quantity check,
all the key features for efficient management are provided.
otherFeaturesDescMobile: From product register, stock in & out, to quantity check, all the key features for efficient management are provided.
pageDescription: BoxHero provides the core features for efficient inventory management from registering products to making transactions. Don't miss out on BoxHero's user-friendly mobile service as well.
pageTitle: About BoxHero - The Simplest Inventory Management Solution
strongPoint1Desc:

BoxHero's simplicity and convenience is
perfect for first-time users to start managing their inventory today.
